targets.query: SELECT last("total_amount_0"), last("total_amount_1"), last("total_amount_2"), last("total_amount_3"), last("total_amount_4"), last("total_amount_5"), last("total_amount_6"), last("total_amount_7"), last("total_amount_8"), last("total_amount_9"), last("total_amount_10") FROM "stardust_addresses" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation_interval) fill(null)
